column4: Fitch Affirms British American Tobacco plc. at 'A-'; Outlook Stable
column5: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) LONDON  March 03 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed British American Tobacco  plc.'s (BAT) Long-term Issuer Default Rating (IDR) at 'A-' with a Stable  Outlook. The Short-term IDR has been affirmed at 'F2'. In addition  the senior  unsecured long-term rating of debt issued by BAT's subsidiaries  B.A.T.  International Finance plc and B.A.T. Netherlands Finance B.V.  has been affirmed  at 'A-'. The short-term debt rating has been affirmed
